## 编译环境
宏包版本：gbt7714 v1.0
标注样式：super / numbers / authoryear

## 描述问题
国标第 xx 页要求……而编译的结果是……

bib 数据库代码：
```TeX
@book{knuth86a,
  author       = {Donald E. Knuth},
  title        = {The {\TeX}book},
  volume       = {A},
  publisher    = {Addison-Wesley},
  address      = {Reading, MA, USA},
  year         = {1986},
  series       = {Computers and Typesetting},
}
```
